title: Indians manager Terry Francona favors name change

post.title: Indians manager Terry Francona favors name change

body:
As a huge Indians fan this pisses me off to no end. White liberals ruin absolutely fucking everything.

I was at the Allstar game in Cleveland last season and I saw the reddest dude I have ever seen in my life with a shirt that said "Save Chief Wahoo." I swear 90+% of Natives either like it or they don't give a shit, but white liberals have to ruin any and all fun for everyone else. And they create mobs so you aren't allowed to dissent. Francona probably sees the writing on the wall here. Even if he doesn't want it to change, if he says that, he thinks he'll probably be looked at as Satan 5-10 years down the line for that statement. Hell, some people would look at him that way now.

I just don't fucking understand it. I always knew the Wahoo logo probably wouldn't survive. But even just a year or two ago I was naively quite certain the name would stay for a long time. It's insane just how fast the overton window has moved. And that doesn't just effect sports team names. It's a huge overarching problem that should alarm everyone.

I was at the Allstar game in Cleveland last season and I saw the reddest dude I have ever seen in my life with a shirt that said "Save Chief Wahoo." Francona probably sees the writing on the wall here. Even if he doesn't want it to change, if he says that, he thinks he'll probably be looked at as Satan 5-10 years down the line for that statement. Hell, some people would look at him that way now.

I just don't fucking understand it. I always knew the Wahoo logo probably wouldn't survive. But even just a year or two ago I was naively quite certain the name would stay for a long time. It's insane just how fast the overton window has moved. And that doesn't just effect sports team names. It's a huge overarching problem that should alarm everyone.
